subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored on a spectacular 40-yard shot in the sixth minute, and defending champion Manchester United defeated Porto, 1-0, on Wednesday night to advance to the European Champions League semifinals with a 3-2 aggregate victory. Manchester United extended its Champions League record unbeaten streak to 23 games and will meet Arsenal in an all-English semifinal, at home April 29, with the return match May 5. Arsenal defeated Spain’s Villarreal, 3-0, on goals by Theo Walcott, Emmanuel Adebayor and Robin van Persie to advance by 4-1 on aggregate.
